materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph representation of a burmese painting. In the photograph, a demon of the forest is presenting his bow to the Buddha, who is in a seated position. The Buddha is seated on the right, with the demon kneeling on the left. Behind the demon, there is another man looking at the scene. There is a bird perched on a branch on the left of the photograph. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Demon of the forest presenting his bow to Gautama Buddha
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Gautama Buddha Folk tales
